detailsSection:
Cumulative Update 1 for Microsoft Host Integration Server 2020 contains hotfixes for issues that were fixed after the release of Host Integration Server 2020. We recommend that you test the cumulative update before you deploy it in a production environment. This cumulative update (CU) is a rollup update that contains the following items:
  • All previously released hotfixes for Host Integration Server 2020.
  • Accessibility-related improvements.
Notes:
  • This cumulative update does not contain fixes for Microsoft Enterprise Single Sign-On (SSO). Therefore, this update does not apply to stand-alone SSO servers.
systemRequirementsSection:
Supported Operating Systems
Windows Server 2019, Windows Server 2020, Windows 10, Windows 11

These cumulative updates require that Host Integration Server 2020, or a Host Integration 2020 Client be installed on the system.   These updates can also be applied on top of previous updates.  They are supported on the same operating systems as Host Integration Server 2016.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, and click Next.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open.
    • To save the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the download, click Cancel.
